main.remarks: An immutable record for exchanging information about an object.

property.name: ContentStreamed
property.summary: True if the object's Content is streamed.

property.name: LiveStream
property.summary: True if the Content Stream is Live or incomplete.

property.name: Size
property.summary: A DataItem's byte or content collection count. A Tool's DataItem count.

main.remarks: Methods to determine the type of object a descriptor represents.

method.name: IsBinaryItem
method.summary: Determines if descriptor was generated by a BinaryItem.
method.returns: True if descriptor represents a BinaryItem.

method.name: IsCodeItem
method.summary: Determines if descriptor was generated by a CodeItem.
method.returns: True if descriptor represents a CodeItem.

method.name: IsCommand
method.summary: Determines if descriptor was generated by a BinaryItem containing a Command.
method.returns: True if descriptor represents a BinaryItem containing a Command.

method.name: IsDataItem
method.summary: Determines if descriptor was generated by a DataItem.
method.returns: True if descriptor represents a DataItem.

method.name: IsDataSetItem
method.summary: Determines if descriptor was generated by a DataSetItem.
method.returns: True if descriptor represents a DataSetItem.

method.name: IsGenericItem
method.summary: Determines if descriptor was generated by a GenericItem.
method.returns: True if descriptor represents a GenericItem.

method.name: IsGuidReferenceItem
method.summary: Determines if descriptor was generated by a GuidReferenceItem.
method.returns: True if descriptor represents a GuidReferenceItem.

method.name: IsKeySet
method.summary: Determines if descriptor was generated by a KeySet.
method.returns: True if descriptor represents a KeySet.

method.name: IsMSBuildItem
method.summary: Determines if descriptor was generated by a MSBuildItem.
method.returns: True if descriptor represents a MSBuildItem.

method.name: IsMultiMediaItem
method.summary: Determines if descriptor was generated by a MultiMediaItem.
method.returns: True if descriptor represents a MultiMediaItem.

method.name: IsTextItem
method.summary: Determines if descriptor was generated by a TextItem.
method.returns: True if descriptor represents a TextItem.

method.name: IsService
method.summary: Determines if descriptor was generated by a BinaryItem containing a Service.
method.returns: True if descriptor represents a BinaryItem containing a Service.
